edu.washington.ext

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that builds the Library system. It calculates pay and creates the lists of all employees, tracks the Library number and who the Librarian is.
    Author:
    chris turner
